FirstTime: Because you never launched this app prevously, we would need you to fill in a few stuff
CloseCSGO: Please, close CSGO if you still have it running
AddOption: Now you need to add '-condebug' to your launch options
OptionPath: In order to access launch options you need to right click on CSGO in your Steam library, then go to Properties > Launch options
LaunchGame: Now we need to launch CSGO
AddBind: Open console with ~ and type 'bind f7 "exec botexec"' (you may add this bind in autoexec.cfg if you want)
SelectLanguage: Please select a language from list below
LanguageWarn: ! WARNING ! Selected language needs to be the same your game's language
FailedLanguage: Failed to use {0} as a chosen language
ProvideSteamID: Please copy-paste a SteamID of your Steam account and then press Enter
SteamIDExample: SteamID should look something like this: STEAM_X:X:XXXXXXXXX
SteamIDSite: You can check your SteamID on a site like https://steamid.io/
InvalidSteamID: {0} is an invalid SteamID and could not be used
OtherSettings: Every other togglable setting is accessable at Data/Config.json
Ready: Now you can join the match and type '/start' in chat to begin and then '/stop' in chat or 'stop_bot' in console to stop
